Package com.ooad.hw1.engine

Class Character

java.lang.Object
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Sprite
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Collidable
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Character
public class Character extends Collidable
Character objects represents main character class in our game. It has some variables that is used in game logic. Also, it has two images. One of them is presented while you are not moving and the other one is presented while you are moving. It has a concrete decorator object x1Multiplier powerUp that will help you to track of the multiplier powerups. It has 3 health and default JumpBehavior is ShortJump PS: There should be just one Character object in the game.

    • getStrings

      public ArrayList<String> getStrings()
      I used an ArrayList to keep track of log messages that has been sent by Character object Since almost every log message is sent from this class, I located here.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of log messages

    • draw

      protected void draw(Graphics2D g2D)
      Description copied from class: Sprite
      It used to draw images and string to the screen. All inherited classes should implement draw method since it is abstract, and draw conditions are differs from each other.
      Overrides:
      draw in class Collidable
      Parameters:
      g2D - Graphics2D object that will help to draw images, string to the panel.

    • CollisionAction

      protected void CollisionAction(Character character)
      Description copied from class: Collidable
      When collision happens there must be some actions to take on. Implement this method to do what function you want to enable on Character object
      Specified by:
      CollisionAction in class Collidable
      Parameters:
      character - object that collided with this current object.

    • increaseScore

      public void increaseScore()
      When Character objects passes successfully an enemy, it will be rewarded with a score. This method recursively calculates all multipliers that inside of the decorated multiplier object, and adds this multiplier to the score.

    • getScore

      public long getScore()
      Getter for current score of Character object
      Returns:
      current score

    • addLogMessage

      public void addLogMessage(String message)
      Method for adding log messages to ArrayList of messages. If ArrayList's size is greater or equal to 10, it removes last message that has been added, and adds new message.
      Parameters:
      message - Log message

    • decreaseHealth

      public void decreaseHealth()
      Decreases health of the Character object. If its health equal to 0, stops the game.
